6-1.label: Programming
6-1.description: Develop basic programming skills used in subjects of greater complexity
6-1.name: prog

6-1.label: Foundation
6-1.description: Build depth and breadth in areas ranging from circuits and electronics to applied electromagnatics and from principles of software development to signals and systems.
6-1.name: foundation

6-1.label: Header
6-1.description: Provide mastering within EECS's subdisciplines: microelectronics; communicaiton, control and signal processing; bioelectrical engineering; computer systems engineering; design and analysis of algorithims; artificial intelligence.
6-1.name: header

6-1.label: Communication Intensive
6-1.description: Students must make one of their two required CI-M classes either 6.UAT or 6.UAR.
6-1.name: CIM2
